en.weather_raport: The weather. Now it's {condition_now}. The temperature is {temp_now}, pressure is {pressure_now}, and humidity is {humidity_now}. The wind speed is around {wind_speed_now}. When it comes to tomorrow, it will be {condition_tomorrow}, with an average of {temp_tomorrow} and minimum {temp_min_tomorrow}. The precipitation is: {precipitation_tomorrow}. Finally, the wind speed will be {wind_speed}. Data was updated at {updated_at}. Now it's {now}.

pl.weather_raport: Pogoda. Aktualnie jest {condition_now}. Temperatura wynosi {temp_now}, ciśnienie: {pressure_now}, a wilgotność powietrza: {humidity_now}. Prędkość wiatru to {wind_speed_now}. Jeśli chodzi o jutro, to będzie {condition_tomorrow}, z temperaturą wynoszącą średnio {temp_tomorrow} oraz minimalnie {temp_min_tomorrow}. Opady: {precipitation_tomorrow}, a prędkość wiatru: {wind_speed}. Dane zostały odświeżone o godzinie {updated_at}. Teraz jest {now}.
